entry.title: Graduation Fundraising Puzzle. Custom fundraising idea for college tuition.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 44.99 - 51.99 (14 variants)

It's graduation time and there's no better way to send your graduate off into their next chapter than with a custom puzzle.  Turn that graduation photo into a lasting memory that they can piece together daily. 

If you've ever needed a custom fundraising idea that is easy, fast, and very effective then this fundraiser is for you. Gather your graduation photo and turn it into your ticket to college! It's so easy to use a customized puzzle as an event-based fundraiser too - we'll guide the way on how you can make money FAST.

Check out our FUNDRAISER page filled with ideas on how to use a custom puzzle for a unique and fast fundraiser.

entry.title: Black Autism Awareness Jigsaw Puzzle Ribbon Scarf
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 14.99

Our beautiful handmade and hand-cut Puzzle Pattern scarf features anti-pill fleece with an autism awareness puzzle ribbon that makes you smile.  Frequently used for Autism Awareness, this pattern is hard to find a pattern that matches almost every outfit.  Show your support while looking stylish.  Handmade in our shop, order soon as there is a limited supply, a simple design, and not sewn.  

These scarves are hand-cut in our store and are approximately 58 inches long and 8-10 inches wide.  Made of 100% polyester, it is recommended that you:

  • Machine Wash Cold, Delicate Cycle, No Chlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Remove Promptly
Each scarf will vary slightly as each is hand cut.  The material is an anti-pill fleece material that will keep you warm while looking very stylish.  This product is not sewn, is cut by hand, and is unique.

entry.title: Custom Photo Puzzle 16 x 20 Inches - Choose Your Piece Count From 15 to 500 Piece Custom Puzzles
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 44.99 - 51.99 (14 variants)

You've seen custom puzzles before, but not like these! Our custom photo puzzles are made of high-quality materials, as we are a top manufacturer in the custom photo puzzle business. 

Your custom puzzle will be an heirloom that lasts a lifetime and will bring tears of joy to the recipient. And at this price? Don't wait as puzzle supplies are limited right now due to such incredible demand!  A hot gift that is completely personalized from your photo and in your choice of piece count.

Your loved ones will LOVE getting personalized photos from YOU in their hands fast,  with no other work required but assembling them into their beautiful puzzle.

The finished size is approximately 16 x 20 inches which means that it is perfect for framing when this masterpiece custom puzzle is assembled.

This personalized puzzle is the PERFECT last-minute gift for everyone on your gift list, even for your loved one who has everything.

Our very affordable puzzles are the perfect family fun for the perfect Christmas Gift Birthday Present or just to say I Love You. So gather your photos and have fun.

Our 16x20 inch puzzle comes in 15, 30, 63, 80, 104, 320, or 500 pieces.  Simply select your piece count and we'll do the rest! We print on high-quality puzzle board in a professional matte finish, and they are Made In America.

*Our 320 and 500 pieces are similarly shaped and sized, so please be sure that the recipient is an expert in puzzling.  We recommend using a photo that is colorful and has many patterns.  We do not offer to number puzzle pieces on our 320 or 500 piece puzzle so please do not select this option.  (You will receive an error message stating that the product is unavailable.)

If you have questions about your photo resolution, please click HERE for more information.

 Happy Puzzling!

entry.title: Custom Puzzle With 30 Extra Large Puzzle Pieces Perfect for Young Children and Toddlers
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 44.99 - 49.99 (2 variants)

Our beautiful custom photo puzzle with Extra Large Puzzle Pieces make this puzzle the perfect puzzle for a unique and alternative Family Portrait.  Each extra-large 30 piece puzzle piece measures approximately 3 x 4 inches, making this custom puzzle easy to hold and maneuver.  Each piece has a large surface area and the finished size is approximately 16x20 inches when complete.  The pieces are easy to grab and hold for the young fingers.

Featuring generous-sized pieces, this puzzle is perfect for the Baby Shower, Family Portraits, Toddlers, and Special events.  The extra-large piece sizes make it easy to work with while providing the detail needed to preserve cherished memories. 
If you require a custom puzzle with fewer pieces, we also offer a beautiful 16 x 20-inch puzzle with 15 Pieces HERE. 
 
OPTIONS:  

HAND-NUMBERING:  We can hand-number the back of each puzzle piece for ease of assembly.  This is especially helpful if you order multiple puzzles, as we can hand-number in different colors.

RUSH OPTION:  When you select the RUSH option, we will move your order to the front of our queue and expedite the order.  This option is very important during holidays and during the pandemic, as orders can be backed up for weeks without this option.  Please be sure to select the proper shipping option for your timeline at the time of checkout.

entry.title: Personalized Photo Puzzle - 500 Piece Personalized Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 46.99 - 51.99 (2 variants)

Perfect Gift for that hard to buy for person. Photo Puzzle with 500 pieces.  Our very popular custom puzzle with 500 pieces presents quite a challenge for even the best puzzler! This is our best selling puzzle and has been widely given as a Birthday, Christmas, Retirement, and gifts for that hard to buy for person.  The finished size is approximately 16 x 20 inches.

*Our 320 and 500 piece puzzles are recommended for the expert plus puzzler.  The puzzles feature pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge.  It is recommended that photos for these piece counts have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided.

entry.title: Perfect Personalized Grandparent Gift Idea. Custom Photo Puzzle with 320 XL Pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 46.99 - 51.99 (2 variants)

We offer the perfect personalized photo puzzle gift for carefree Seniors, Grandparents, and even your In-Laws.  This 320 piece personalized puzzle features your most cherished memory of family history and is Made In America.  

This puzzle features Large Puzzle Pieces that are manageable for all hands while showing nice detail in the photo.  Each puzzle piece measures approximately 1 x 1 inch each, making them a little larger than the standard puzzle.  

Great for people who are visually impaired or need a little more to grasp onto.  With over three hundred pieces, this custom puzzle will keep you busy and is recommended for the expert puzzler, as it is similarly shaped and sized, but not exact!  A fan favorite, this sturdy and thick custom puzzle has been given as a Personalized Grandparent's gift idea, teacher gifts, and has unlimited uses.  Why not frame it for a great family portrait puzzle?

*It's important to note that our 320 piece puzzle is recommended for the expert puzzler.  This large custom puzzle features pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge to even an expert who has puzzled for years.  It is recommended that your photos for this puzzle have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided and high-resolution images are suggested.  Check out our blog post on Choosing A Photograph.
